com.arjuna.ArjunaCommon.Common
Class DebugController

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.arjuna.ArjunaCommon.Common.DebugController
public class DebugController
extends java.lang.Object

This class controls the debugging that can be output by the system.

Since:
JTS 1.2.4.

          We don't want users creating instances directly.

debugAllowed

public boolean debugAllowed()
Is it allowed to print debugging statements? This method assumes 
DebugLevel.FULL_DEBUGGING,
 VisibilityLevel.VIS_ALL, FacilityCode.FAC_ALL)

getStream

public java.io.PrintWriter getStream()
Returns:
the PrintWriter used to output debugging statements. The default is to send to standard output. Can only be set at initialisation time.

getStream

public java.io.PrintWriter getStream(long dl,
                                     long vl,
                                     long fl)
Returns:
the PrintWriter used to output debugging statements if the correct debugging level is set. Otherwise return null.
Since:
JTS 2.1.
